title: Fighting for Grace
description: WARNING: This book does talk about physical abuse.Â EVANI'm down on my luck and out of patience.If I can't fight, who am I?I still go to the gym every day to train and get better.When I get talked into teaching self-defense lessons, I never expected to meet her.She's sweet, innocent... and in trouble.Injured or not, I'm fighting for Grace.I'm in it now, and it's going to be the fight of my life.This is a Steamy, Sweet, Short Story Romance. No Cliffhangers. This is the sixth story in the Worth the Fight Series. If you love short romances with insta love, hot love scenes, and a sweet story, then this one is for you.Make sure you check out the other books in the Worth The Fight Series:Fighting for Hope - Olivia T. TurnerFighting for the Forbidden - Frankie LoveFighting for Faith - Aria Cole and Mila CrawfordFighting for Dylan - Abby KnoxFighting for Honor - Dani WyattFighting for Grace - Hope Ford
author: Hope Ford
